Stock Forecasts V2.0.0

An app to be used on stockcharts.com and finance.yahoo.com. It displays analysts’ average price forecast from Tip Ranks™.

How to: 
1) Pin the extension for quick access. 
2) Navigate to a stock page on supported sites: e.g. https://stockcharts.com/h-sc/ui?s=CVX or https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/NFLX?p=NFLX.
3) Wait for the app to get and show the consensus. 
Confirm the data by clicking on the link at the bottom to visit Tip Rank's stock page.
Optional: Right click on a stock page, then click on "View Stock on Tip Ranks".


V2.0.0 Update:
  - Updated the UI, now presents a smaller popup
  - Added a 'refresh' button which will search for the ticker on the current page and get data for the ticker

V1.1.0 Update:
  - Now works on Yahoo Finance.
  - Updated API name.


Disclaimer: The information provided by Stock Price Forecast is not investment advice. Trading and investing in financial markets involves risk. You are responsible for your own investment decisions.
